TEXT.TITLE: REGENCY CRUISTS <SHIP> CORRECTS EARNINGS
TEXT.BODY: Regency Cruises Inc said its earnings per share for the year 1986 were 36 cts per share, not the 37 cts it reported on March 11. The company lost 10 cts per share in 1985. Reuter
